summary: (Cantonese with English Subtitles) In this hilarious triad movie parody, celebrity cook "Roast Pork" finds his idyllic life turn topsy-turvy when his old mentor comes out of nowhere and commands him to be the successor of his gang.
cast: Ekin Cheng|Jordan Chan|Alex Fong|Conroy Chi-Chung Chan|Michelle Ye|On-On Yu|Wilfred Lau|Sze-Kwan Cheng|Mo-Chan Chik|Fung Kwok|Wing-Kit Leung|Pong Nan|Kwan-Ho Sze|Derek Tsang|Chi-Wang Wong|Ben Yuen
title: Fei saa fung chung chun
